ygData.subject: Broken Spells and Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: has anyone heard anything about patching the broken spells? Also the quest where your supposed to get Trumpys Irontoes head is broke, I spent 2 hrs on this
ygData.messageBody:
has anyone heard anything about patching the broken spells? Also the quest where your supposed to get Trumpys Irontoes head is broke, I spent 2 hrs on this quest today, finally killed the dwarf and gated before the guards got me just to give the head[actually it was meat] to the guildmaster for him to say "ah your giving me dwarf meat, Thank you", well needless to say at that point I was about to loose my mind, So I called a GM and told him about the Spells [Vamp Embrace and Sum Shadows] just for him to say that he will report it and hopefully it will be addressed in a upcoming patch.......so in a nut shell were SOL! personally I think we should start making alot of noise about this, it seems to 989 that making the sun set and the moon rise is more important than getting our class's spells fixed! also If you would like the screen shots of the talk I had with this GM I would be happy to send them to you.....

P.S. Im sure Im gonna get back some feed back from other class's in the game, all I can say is for you to try to take on 10+ level monsters with a 4th level damage spell and tell me how long you last when you have 3 of them on you...


Delggath
One Very Pissed Necomancer
